Key Match Events: The Los Angeles Lakers defeated the New Orleans Pelicans, making it five-straight wins for the Lakers.
The Pelicans, despite being shorthanded, battled down to the wire with the Lakers.
The NBA's Last Two Minute Report included one missed call with 1:33 remaining, where possession should have been awarded to the Pelicans.
The Pelicans had an opportunity to attempt a game-tying three on their final possession but turned the ball over, sealing the game for the Lakers.
